name: Agriculture allocation as a % of total expenditure
description: The proportion of total local government expenditure that is allocated to the agriculture sector, by district.

name: The percentage rate of antenatal care coverage, by district.
description: red

name: Average household size
description: The number of people who normally live and eat together, by district.

name: Centrally raised revenues
description: The proportion of local government revenue that is funded though central government transfers, by district.

name: Average dependency ratio
description: A ratio of people typically not in the labour force (the dependent part) and those typically in the labour force (the productive part). The higher the ratio, the higher the level of dependency.

name: Decent standard of living score
description: The basic needs for people to have a decent standard of living. The higher the score the better standard of living.

name: Primary education donor spending per child
description: On-budget donor funded expenditure allocations per child in government primary education, by district.

name: Donor funds
description: The proportion of local government revenue that is funded through donor funding, by district.

name: Donor revenues
description: The proportion of local government revenue that is funded through donor funding, by district.

name: Diphtheria treatment coverage rate
description: The average rate of diphtheria treatment coverage, by district.

name: Education allocation as a % of total expenditure
description: The proportion of total local government expenditure that is allocated to the education sector, by district.

name: National finance
description: National finance

name: Total expenditure per capita
description: Total per capita local government expenditure allocations, by district.

name: Primary health spending per person
description: Local government spending to healthcare per person, by district.

name: Health allocation as a % of total expenditure
description: The proportion of total local government expenditure that is allocated to the health sector, by district.

name: Approved posts that are filled (%)
description: Proportion of approved health job posts that are filled, by district.

name: HMIS reporting score
description: Health Management Information System (HMIS) reporting score, by district. The higher the score the better the rated performance, with 0 the lowest score possible and 10 the highest.

name: Household sanitation coverage (%)
description: Proportion of the population that has access to improved sanitation facilities, by district.

name: Locally raised revenues
description: The proportion of local government revenue that is locally generated, through collection of fees, fines and other local taxation, by district.

name: Tetanus vaccine coverage rate
description: The average coverage rate of tetanus toxoid vaccine treatment, by district.

name: Primary leaving exam performance index
description: The percentage of pupils that pass the primary education leaving exam, by district.

name: Life expectancy
description: Average number of years that a person can expect to live in 'full health' by taking into account years lived in less than full health due to disease and/or injury. This can be derived for either males or females and is, in most populations, slightly higher for females. Life expectancy is normally determined at birth but can be derived at any other age based on the current death rates.

name: Locally raised revenues
description: The proportion of local government revenue that is locally generated, through collection of fees, fines and other local taxation, by district.

name: District league table overall score
description: A composite index based on the performance of all district health indicators. The higher the score the better the rated performance, with 0 the lowest score possible and 100 the highest.

name: Population density (per sq km)
description: The population per square kilometre, by district.

name: Poverty headcount
description: Percentage of people in poverty, in relation to the total population in a given area, based on the national poverty line. It does not take into account the depth of poverty. The data year is given as the document publication date, but is based on estimates from previous household surveys by the Uganda Bureau of Statistics.

name: Primary education spending per child
description: Total local government expenditure per child in government funded primary education by district.

name: Primary net enrolment rate
description: The number of children of official primary school age who are enrolled in primary education as a percentage of the total children of the official school age population.

name: Primary pupils with adequate sitting and writing space-all schools (%)
description: The percentage of primary school pupils in government and private run educational facilities that have adequate reading and writing space in their classrooms, by district.

name: Primary pupils with adequate sitting and writing space-government schools (%)
description: The percentage of primary school pupils in government run educational facilities that have adequate reading and writing space in their classrooms, by district.

name: Primary pupil to teacher ratio-all schools
description: The number of pupils per teacher in all primary education schools, by district.

name: Primary pupil to teacher ratio-government schools
description: Primary pupil to teacher ratio-government schools.

name: Rural access to safe water (%)
description: Percentage of people in rural Uganda who have access to potable water,by district.

name: Rural water source functionality (%)
description: Access to adequate amounts (20 litres per person per day minimum) of safe drinking water (treated surface water or uncontaminated borehole / protected well water) within a convenient distance from the user's dwelling (within a walking distance of not more than half a kilometre), by district.

name: Secondary net enrolment rate
description: The number of children of official secondary school age who are enrolled in secondary education as a percentage of the total children of the official school age population.

name: Secondary pupils with adequate sitting and writing space (total)
description: The percentage of secondary school pupils in government and private run educational facilities that have adequate reading and writing space in their classrooms, by district.

name: Secondary pupils with adequate sitting and writing space (government schools)
description: The percentage of secondary school pupils in government run educational facilities that have adequate reading and writing space in their classrooms, by district.

name: Secondary pupil-teacher ratio (total)
description: The number of pupils per teacher in all secondary education schools, by district.

name: Secondary pupil-teacher ratio (government schools)
description: The relationship between the number of students enrolled in a school and the number of 'full-time equivalent' teachers employed by the school, by district.

name: Tuberculosis treatment success rate
description: Percentage of successes among a number of attempts for treatment of tuberculosis, by district.

name: Total population
description: The number of people who live in a district.

name: Urban population (%)
description: Percentage of population living in an urban setting, by district.

name: Urban and rural population (%)
description: Percentage of population living in urban and rural settings, by district.

name: District WASH performance score
description: A composite index of all district-level water and sanitation performance indicators.

name: Functioning water source committees (%)
description: Percentage of water committees that are functioning, by district.
